title: Cowboy Junkies (1990)
itunes:title: Cowboy Junkies (1990)
description:
Cowboy Junkies return for a second SNAP session in February 1990. Newly expanded into an octet, the band’s set includes songs from their first three records, plus a few others slated for a future album.

Deirdre also chats extensively with singer Margo Timmins.
itunes:summary:

 Deirdre also chats extensively with singer Margo Timmins.
media:description: Cowboy Junkies return for a second SNAP session in February 1990 to preview songs from their third album, “The Caution Horses.”
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW, Tricia Halloran)
itunes:author: KCRW, Tricia Halloran

Cowboy Junkies return for a second SNAP session in February 1990. Newly expanded into an octet, the band’s set includes songs from their first three records, plus a few others slated for a future album.
